## The Limit Order Book

The *limit order book* 


## Example

<!-- make use of the awesome 'orderbook' R package -->

```{r messsage=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
#{{{
library(orderbook)
library(shiny)
renderPrint({
    filename <- system.file("extdata",
                            "sample.txt",
                            package = "orderbook")
    ob <- orderbook(file = filename)
    ob <- read.orders(ob, 10000)
    display(ob)
})
#}}}
```
